mapper.sql: bsd.id as bsd_id, bsd.site_id as bsd_site_id, bsd.store_id as bsd_store_id, bsd.template_no as bsd_template_no, bsd.start_time as bsd_start_time, bsd.end_time as bsd_end_time, bsd.account_source as bsd_account_source, bsd.is_del as bsd_is_del, bsd.create_time as bsd_create_time, bsd.update_time as bsd_update_time
mapper.insert: insert into b_servce_template (id, site_id, store_id, template_no, start_time, end_time, account_source, is_del, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accountSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())

insert into b_servce_template
id,
site_id,
store_id,
template_no,
start_time,
end_time,
account_source,
is_del,
create_time, update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{templateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{accountSource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),
mapper.update:
update b_servce_template
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
template_no = #{templateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
account_source = #{accountSource,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update b_servce_template set store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, template_no = #{templateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, account_source = #{accountSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and site_id = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from b_servce_template bsd where bsd.id in ( select max(id) FROM b_servce_template where 1=1 and store_id=#{storeId} group by template_no )
